column4: This is a really odd issue, but I recently switched my icons to the OSX theme, and now all of a sudden when I get to the login screen, as soon as I type any character it crashes and says "The greeter has crashed, opening new greeter" or something similar, but that greeter crashes as soon as I type in a single character. anyone have any idea qhats going on? I cant even log on to change my settings around.
can you do a console login instead? (recovery mode or something)
and you can't go to another terminal screen  <ctl><alt><f1>  etc?
ok, so now all you gotta do is change it back manually :)   you're on your own there!
